Title: A Novel Validated Breast Aesthetic Scale
Description: Scale for breast aesthetic evaluation (VBRAS) with 13 items

Title: Analysis of cosmetic results following primary radiation therapy for stages I and II carcinoma of the breast
Description: Harvard Scale for breast aesthetic evaluation (4 grades, from poor to excellent)

Title: Aesthetic, Quality-of-Life, and Clinical Outcomes after Inferior Pedicle Oncoplastic Reduction Mammoplasty
Description: Clinical study that uses Breast-Q (patient reported outcomes) and VBRAS scale (annotated by specialists)

Title: Development of a New Patient-Reported Outcome Measure for Breast Surgery: The BREAST-Q
Description: Breast-Q: questionnaire for patient reported outcomes after breast surgery evaluating satisfaction with breast, satisfaction with treatment and quality of life after treatment

Title: The surgeon's perceived value of patient-reported outcome measures (PROMs): an exploratory qualitative study of 5 different surgical subspecialties
Description: Study evaluating surgeon's perspectives on PROMs,

Title: Benefits of a Short, Practical Questionnaire to Measure Subjective Perception of Nasal Appearance after Aesthetic Rhinoplasty
Description: Utrecht Questionaire - PROM (patient reported outcome measure) to assess the aesthetic outcome of rhynoplasty

Title: Development and validation of the expectations of aesthetic rhinoplasty scale
Description: Expectations of Aesthetic Rhinoplasty Scale (EARS) - Scale to measure patient expectations before rhynoplasty and pinpoint patients with body dysmorphic disorder

Title: Measuring Patient-Reported Outcomes in Facial Aesthetic Patients: Development of the FACE-Q
Description: Face-Q: PROM to evaluate various items in patients that underwent facial plastic surgery

Title: Outcomes Research in Facial Plastic Surgery: A Review and New Directions
Description: Questionnaires for Rhynoplasty Outcome Evaluation, Blaspheroplasty Outcome Evaluation, etc. focusing on appearance and functionality.

Title: The 10-item standardized cosmesis and health nasal outcomes survey (SCHNOS) for functional and cosmetic rhinoplasty
Description: PROM for rhynoplasty that evaluates both aesthetic and functional outcomes

Title: Pre-operative drawings of anticipated closures as a visual tool to align patient and physician expectations for Mohs and reconstructive surgery
Description: Drawing on the patient's skin as a manner of explaining the expected aesthetic outcome of treatment for reconstructive surgery after Mohs microscopic surgery (skin cancer removal)

Title: The Effect of Photographic Visual Aids in Preoperative Patient Counseling in Oculoplastic Surgery
Description: Study regarding patient counseling with and without photos of past cases

Title: Subjective assessment of facial aesthetics after maxillofacial orthognathic surgery for obstructive sleep apnoea
